publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4412 Michael Matheson: Broadcast of Scottish Women’s Football Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow City LFC and Aberdeen LFC on reaching the Scottish Women’s Football Cup final; notes that this final will not be televised, and hopes that the broadcasters will reverse their decision for next year’s final and show one of Scotland’s fastest-growing sports.
S2M-4412 Broadcast of Scottish Women’s Football Cup Final (lodged on 17 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4412 Michael Matheson: Broadcast of Scottish Women’s Football Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow City LFC and Aberdeen LFC on reaching the Scottish Women’s Football Cup final; notes that this final will not be televised, and hopes that the broadcasters will reverse their decision for next year’s final and show one of Scotland’s fastest-growing sports. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
